Ã‚Â³|    ÃƒÂ¾                                                                ÃƒÂ¾    |Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³:    : Stradivari is a name synonymous with quality. The Stradivari   :    :Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     . Violin is regarded by experts as the best violin ever made and .     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       a genuine Stravidivai violin is worth millions. An instrument        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       of this distinction required a unique way to faithfully              Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       capture and recreate its sound quality and playability.              Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       -Sonic Morphing- technologies provided the answer. Morphing          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       describes what can be seen in motion pictures where there is a       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       gradual transformation from one image into another. This basic       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       concept has been applied to sound samples allowing sound             Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       samples to morph into each other seamlessly.                         Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       With the Stradivari Solo Violin, using exclusive "harmonic           Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       alignment" technology, you can seamlessly morph between              Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       different dynamics and hear authentic timbre changes as notes        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       become louder or softer. Sophisticated modal resonance               Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       technology allows you to control the onset, intensity and rate       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       of vibrato, impart portamento and much more. In addition, a          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       powerful AI midi processor allows you to change or create            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       articulations in real time, change the type of attack or bow         Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       direction, impart legato, play trills & tremolo and have an          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       infinite variety of playing possibilities at your fingertips.        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       All this in real time!                                               Ã‚Â³        
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       The result of these technologies is extraordinary levels of          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       realism, expressiveness and virtusosic performance capabilities      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       in a way that preserves the natural characteristics of the           Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       Stradivari Violin. This instrument leaps to life beneath your        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       fingertips!                                                          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
